title: Deliciousss
subtitle: A food recipe application
description: As a frontend developer, my passion lies in crafting delightful food recipe applications. I utilize external APIs to seamlessly fetch and display mouthwatering dishes from around the world, complete with step-by-step instructions. My dedication is to create interactive culinary platforms that allow users to explore and cook their favorite dishes effortlessly and with flair.

title: Modareseen
subtitle: An integrated educational platform
description: As a full-stack developer, I spearheaded the development of Modareseen.com, seamlessly integrating Firebase's suite of tools. On the backendm, My focus was on ensuring scalability, performance, data integrity, and security. On the frontend, I used Material-UI to create an appealing and user-friendly interface with a consistent design language and responsive layout. My comprehensive efforts in both frontend and backend development were instrumental in delivering a cohesive and efficient web application tailored to user needs.

title: Grandeur
subtitle: An online shopping store for watches
description: As a frontend developer, I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly online watch shops. Leveraging plain CSS and Swiper.js, I design interfaces with consistent aesthetics and responsive layouts, ensuring an enjoyable shopping experience for customers.  I create user-friendly interfaces that cater to both Arabic and English-speaking users. My focus is on crafting efficient and captivating web platforms tailored to meet the needs of watch enthusiasts and shoppers.

title: Safer
subtitle: Safer Website is Travel Advisor
description: As a frontend developer, my expertise lies in designing visually stunning and intuitive travel advisory websites. I harness the power of external APIs to seamlessly integrate real-time data on hotels, restaurants, and attractions, ensuring travelers have access to the latest and most relevant information for their journey. My commitment is to build dynamic and engaging web platforms that provide travelers with the essential guidance they need to explore new destinations confidently and safely.
